name: prikola.net cleaner
description: quick and dirty cleaner for prikola.net's /id/* pages
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.prikola.net/id/"), url-prefix("http://prikola.net/id/") {
   a[href="http://www.ininform.ru"],
   table[class="moduletable"],
   noindex > TABLE[class="moduletable"][cellSpacing="0"][cellPadding="0"],
   table[bgcolor="#FF0000"],
   a[href*="http://sexvideobase.net/lid/"],
   img[style="display: block; border: 1px solid black;"],
   table[bordercolor="#FF0000"],
   a[href="http://www.moneyteacher.ru"],
   div[id*="rdminfrm_"],
   div[id*="teasernet_"],
   div[id="mbutton"],
   table[border="0"][width="179"],
   table[width="63%"][border="0"][align="center"],
   a[href*="http://pornozona.info"],
   a[href*="http://gsmspytds.ru/"],
   a[href*="http://dampriz.ru/"],
   a[target="_blank"],
   a[href*="http://voob.ru/"],
   a[href*="http://li.ru/go"],
   a[href*="http://gloryadult.com/tds/in.cgi"],
   a[href*="http://lickme.ru/"],
   *[src*="clicktraffi"],
   *[href*="clicktraffi"],
   *[id*="clicktraffi"],
   *[id*="gamingpartners_"],
   *[src*="/bazar_fast/"],
   a[href^="http://vodkov.net/"],
   img[src^="http://vodkov.net/"],
   noindex > a,
   span[class*="gamingPartnersSWF"],
   div[id*="gamingPartnersSWF"],
   *[src*="http://gamingpartners.org/"],
   div[id="res"],
   div[id^="prikola.net_"],
   div[id^="rtn"],
   div[style*="Z-INDEX"],
   div[id="hidden_div_for_click_request"],
   div[width="100%"][align="center"],
   h1 > font[color="#000000"],
   hr,
   object,
   iframe,
   SPAN[style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt"],
   span[id*="span_gamingpartners_"],
   a[href^="http://orehic.ru"],
   a[href^="http://www.ereality.ru/reg"],
   *[id*="tet_"],
   *[id*="teb_"],
   *[id*="ngbn_"],
   *[id*="teaser_"],
   *[src*="icqadvert"],
   *[src*="ngbn.net"],
   a[href*="trafogon.ru"],
   div[id*="protizer"],
   div[id^="7ADS"],
   div[id^="bn_"],
   center > a,
   noindex > center,
   div#icqbox,
   *[href*="samaduramen.info"],
   *[href*="spbbong.com"]
      {
         display: none !important;
      }
}
